attributes.action: Ensure English Grammar is on the school curriculum for all pupils
attributes.additional_details: The standard of English Grammar has fallen to its lowest ever ebb, with an attitude of "anything goes" replacing correctness. This is at a time when the internet is a key communication medium, and most web communication takes the written form. All pupils should be taught English Grammar at the age of 11 or 12 and expected to use good spelling and reasonable grammar in all submitted written school work.
